Articles.Content:
lifter used: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107606-0-90-Lifter-sub-assemblies!-for-18-64-72-90-126-162-324-ton-payloads

this baby was originally designed to go to the mun, but can possibly go to minimums, I haven't tried though. ONLY TAKE OFF THE LAST TANK BEFORE YOU LAND, otherwise you will find you won't have enough fuel coming in at 900 mps, but it has plenty of fuel for when you want to slow down 1/2 before landing. To get to the mun, for all of you that don't know how, I get in an orbit first, plan a maneuver to go near the mun's orbit, then wait till a moon encounter, then I go retrograde.

DO NOT USE THIS, IN ANY WAY WITHOUT THE SOLAR PANELS, IT HAS JUST ABOVE 100 CHARGE!

link1 (non rescue or re-entry, kerbals optional.): http://jmp.sh/3U3F0XE

image: http://jmp.sh/gFl0794

link2 (rescue for near objects, re-entry approved. No parachutes, just plain rockets to slow you down. ((in development.)) kerbals optional ): http://jmp.sh/efy0lsY

image2: http://jmp.sh/NIE8ih6

and yes I did use a custom flag, so if it won't work because of that tell me.

custom flag: find the folder>gamedata>squad>flags

UPDATE: link2 (M.U.N. 2) needs improvement on landing.

Edited February 8, 2015 by SPA
new design, and editing.

Wow, that's a really complex yet nice lander!

Although I suggest you embed the image in to the post, as some people might be inconvenienced..
I tried posting an image from my pc, but it wouldn't work because of the characters.
You cant embed images from your pc, you have to upload them to imgur or somesuch. It had nothing to do with characters.

You cant embed images from your pc, you have to upload them to imgur or somesuch. It had nothing to do with characters.

oh well, I'll just keep using jump share, I have so many accounts on different websites, I think im good.
Try hosting the images at Tinypic, there's no need to have an account there. And imgur doesn't need an account either, actually.
cool. Well I gotta update the staus of the 2nd M.U.N. before it becomes caos
